original_text: For ye know how that afterward, when he would have inherited the blessing, he was rejected: for he found no place of repentance, though he sought it carefully with tears.
korean_text: 너희가 아는 바와 같이 그가 그 후에 축복을 이어받으려고 눈물을 흘리며 구하되 버린 바가 되어 회개할 기회를 얻지 못하였느니라

sentences.original_text: For ye know how that afterward
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 그 후에 어떻게 되었는지 알지니

sentences.original_text: when he would have inherited the blessing
for he found no place of repentance
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 회개할 기회를 찾지 못했기 때문이라

sentences.original_text: though he sought it carefully with tears
sentences.korean_translation: 비록 그가 눈물을 흘리며 간절히 찾았더라도
